long_description: The Kelty Bug Blocker shelter won't let mosquitoes, hot sun or unexpected showers spoil the party. Big enough to set up over a picnic table, it opens wide with both a front and back door. This outdoor sanctuary, with 2 hoop poles and 2 ridge poles, is easy to pitch. Large dual-zip front door opens wide; single-zip rear door provides an additional access point and cross ventilation. Clip and sleeve construction provides an easy set up; freestanding design is easy to move around once it's set up. Fully weatherproof with taped seams. Guyout points allow you to secure the Kelty Bug Blocker in place, especially important in blustery weather. Guyline storage pockets keep your place tidy and keeps the guylines easy to locate. Noiseless zipper pulls. Durable DAC(R) hybrid and wrapped fiberglass poles ensure a sturdy structure. Polyester rainfly will not stretch or expand when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch; fly vents keeps air circulating to prevent condensation build-up.
short_description: The Kelty Bug Blocker shelter won't let mosquitoes, hot sun or unexpected showers spoil the party. Big enough to set up over a picnic table, it opens wide with both a front and back door.
